message.entry: Duplicate configuration key ''{0}''. Configuration keys must be unique.
Configuration must be a table containing variables ''Key'' and ''Value''.
Configuration row names must have dimension name ''Key''.
Configuration variable ''{0}'' must be a string or convertible to a string.
FormatClassname must be a class inheriting from org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat.
FormatClassname must be a string or character row vector.
Location must be exact one row of the output of RESOLVE.
Index must be between 1 and NumPartitions.
ReadSize must be a positive integer scalar.
Exception while constructing an instance of Java class ''{0}'':\n{1}: {2}
Could not find Java class ''{0}''. Java classes for both Hadoop and the InputFormat must be present on the Java classpath.
No more data to read. Use RESET method to reset the HadoopInput and check if data is available to read by using the HASDATA method.
